Posts.Content: Oct 24, 2008 03:50PM CrazyfortheCoast wrote: Mimi,  I know your fear and want to assure you, like these other women have, that mets is not an automatic death sentence.  These boards have been so helpful to me showing me first of all, just how many women are LIVING with mets.  Most I've met still work regular jobs.  I, myself, am back to work part-time and so grateful for that.  Our lives have changed and with each new treatment or side effect I learn my "new normal."  Mimi, mets is awful there is no arguing with that.  But it can be dealt with.  sometimes graciously, sometimes not.  And anyway you choose just know that it's okay.  We're here for you.  Use the boards for inspiration, guidance, a place to vent.  Just know you aren't alone.
Posts.Title: bone metastisis mimi73 LuAnnH
